subject: Re: JUnit And Larger Scale Tests
msgSnippet: Jan Kroeze wrote: Is there a better framework, or is it common practice to use JUnit for these tests as well? Based on my experience, best practice is to
messageBody:
"Jan Kroeze" wrote:

"Is there a better framework, or is it common practice to use JUnit
for these tests as well?"

Based on my experience, best practice is to use JUnit for these tests
as well, budgeting some time to cuss and bluster at the bits of design
that run contrary to your needs. You can get a lot done if you are
willing to color within the lines.
